data.description: Utilities and web displays for LaBrea
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Unique set of modules to provide realtime web display of hack
    attempts against a net block runing Tom Liston's "LaBrea"
    scanner/worm disruptor. See:

    http://scans.bizsystems.net http://probes.bizsystems.net
    http://www.hackbusters.net
